|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|gg
|c|☆ShaytheFair|yeah there was no contest there
|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|hyper offense is so scary to play against
|c|☆ShaytheFair|you can say that again
|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|Wanna review the games?
|c|☆ShaytheFair|yeah, I could use some pointers
|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|We can go over it together on voice chat, or I can type notes on Discord
|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|Pros to voice chat: easier, faster
|c|☆Elphaba Thropp|Pros to Discord text: you can keep it saved for future reference
|c|☆ShaytheFair|hmm, I think VC works best for me. I can always type up notes too
